<!-- Generated by Harlequin Webmaker 2.1.3; Transducer 1.0.2 --> <HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE> Sanjiva Weerawarana</TITLE> </HEAD> <BODY> <A NAME=HEADING45></A> <A HREF="AR95Book-46.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bnext.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-44.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bprev.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-6.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bup.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Btop.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bcontent.gif"></A><BR><A HREF="AR95Book-46.html">[Next] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-44.html">[Previous] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-6.html">[Up] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html">[Top] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html">[Contents]</A> <P> <IMG SRC="images/saw.gif"><P> <A NAME=HEADING45-0></A> <H1> <A NAME=MARKER-9-84></A><A NAME=MARKER-10-85></A>Sanjiva Weerawarana</H1> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <P> <EM> Visiting Assistant Professor of Computer Sciences (1994)</EM><P> <EM> B.S., applied mathematics/computer, Kent State University, 1988. M.S., Kent State University, 1989. Ph.D., computer science, Purdue University, 1994.</EM><P> Dr. Weerawarana's research interests involve various issues in Problem Solving Environments (PSEs) for computational science applications. His current research is on intergrating symbolic, numeric, parallel, and intelligent computation as well as on the systems issues (language, user-interface and networking) of PSEs for partial differential equation based applications. He has developed several prototype software systems and is actively involved with the PDE Lab, SoftLab, //ELLPACK and SciencePad projects.<P> Projects: <A HREF=AR95Book-101.html>SciencePad</A>, <A HREF=AR95Book-100.html>Web //ELLPACK</A>, <A HREF=AR95Book-52.html>ELLPACK-PDELab</A>, <A HREF=AR95Book-59.html>SoftLab</A>, <A HREF=AR95Book-99.html>PYTHIA: Using Computational Intelligence to Support Problem Solving Environments</A>, <A HREF=AR95Book-119.html>Multidisciplinary Problem Solving Environments</A><P> <A HREF="http://www.cs.purdue.edu/people/saw"> Weerawarana's home page </A><P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <ADDRESS>CS Annual Report - 19 APR 1996</ADDRESS> <A HREF="AR95Book-46.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bnext.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-44.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bprev.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-6.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bup.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Btop.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bcontent.gif"></A><BR><A HREF="AR95Book-46.html">[Next] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-44.html">[Previous] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-6.html">[Up] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html">[Top] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html">[Contents]</A> <P> </BODY> </HTML> </HTML>
